xmlText.p: KANSAS CITY ROYALS — Signed SS Alcides Escobar to a one-year contract.
LINCOLN SALTDOGS — Signed LHP Ben Smith and C Brant Whiting.
KANSAS CITY T-BONES — Traded RHP Matt Sergey to Sugar Land for OF David Harris.
SIOUX CITY EXPLORERS — Signed LHPs Hunter Ackerman and Ryan Horstman.
SIOUX FALLS CANARIES — Signed RHP Dylan Thompson.
WICHITA WINGNUTS — Signed RHP Jordan Cooper.
NEW JERSEY JACKALS — Signed RHP Shawn Blackwell and OF Jordan Hinshaw.
EVANSVILLE OTTERS — Signed INF Pedro Barrios, OF Hunter Cullen and RHP Randy Wynne.
FLORENCE FREEDOM — Signed C Ryan Dickt.
SOUTHERN ILLINOIS MINERS — Signed INF Cletis Avery, LHP Kyle Brown, RHP Corey Sessions and INF Jack Willsey.
GREEN BAY PACKERS — Announced the resignation of secondary-safeties coach Darren Perry.
MINNESOTA VIKINGS — Signed OT Storm Norton and S Jack Tocho to reserve-futures contracts.
PITTSBURGH STEELERS — Signed WRs Trey Griffey and Tevin Jones, and RB James Summers to reserve/futures contracts.
CALGARY FLAMES — Recalled LWs Ryan Lomberg and Andrew Mangiapane from Stockton (AHL).
DALLAS STARS — Recalled F Jason Dickinson and D Dillon Heatherington and Julius Honka from Texas (AHL).
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Recalled Fs Michael Amadio and Jonny Brodzinski, D Paul LaDue and G Jack Campbell from Ontario (AHL). Placed G Jonathan Quick on injured reserve, retroactive to Jan. 24.
TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING — Recalled G Louis Domingue from Syracuse (AHL).
INTERNATIONAL PARALYMPIC COMMITTEE — Announced Russia has been barred from the Pyeongchang Paralympics.
MLS — Awarded an expansion franchise to Miami.
COASTAL CAROLINA — Named Rick Mueller football executive director of player personnel.
HIGH POINT — Named Ryan Meek volleyball coach.
LOUISVILLE — Named Brian VanGorder defensive coordinator.
